summary: A shack placed right outside of Riverwood with simple containers for a new character to store their things and sleep.
descriptionHtml:
[size=+2][b]Starter Shack[/b][/size]
[size=+1]The Starter Shack is located just outside of Riverwood, on the road from Helgen. The purpose of the Shack is to help the player in the beginning of the game so that they can rest, eat and store their supplies. This home is very useful, as it includes everything you will need to get yourself started with FrostFall, Realistic Needs and Diseases and any other immersive/challenging mod. This mod will not be update very frequently, as it is a very simple mod with few to no bugs.[/size]
[line]
Changes in Version 2.0:
[List]
[*]Adds a mannequin
[*]Adds a weapon rack
[*]Moves tanning rack outside of the house
[*]Adds a wood chopping block
[*]Adds a ladder for easy acces from the road
[/list]
[line]
[size=+1][color=cyan][b]How To Update:[/b][/color][/size]
[b]Make sure you remove all of your items from the house or it will reset all of the containers and will result in all of your items being removed. Other than that, just delete the old version in NMM, and download and install the new one![/b]
author: kotrousj
